column4: HELP, i want to install dawn of ubuntu but i can't extract the "day_of_ubuntu" folder to "/usr/share/backgrounds".. it states that i don't have the permission.. could anyone please help me out? simple and detailed please..
you need to use command line to extract it, or run nautilus with root permissions
gksu nautilus, type that in the propmpt you get aftr you hit Alt+F2
